item.description:
"The Insurance Your Need for Your Real Estate Investing" Wednesday - September 5th - 7pm

A newly informed mind cannot go back to the old way of thinking.” I have found that there are a lot of assumptions made about insurance coverage which has resulted in a lot of disappointed investors. So our goal is to teach you exactly what you need to know to protect your property properly. We will explore the different types of investor property insurance, what risks are covered and what are not. You’ll learn how to decide which coverage options you’ll need at different points of the real estate process, how to calculate the amount of coverage to get what you expect, and the ins and outs of Flood and Law & Ordinance Insurance. We’ll also go over the different ways different companies handle investor property insurance (this is the part where learn how to save money and time).

What will we cover?

What is Investor Property Insurance?
What is my property covered for and what is it not?
Why Do I need Flood insurance? There hasn’t been a flood in a hundred years!
Hassle Free - How to Save Money & Time on Getting and Maintaining Proper Coverage

 

SPEAKER:  Jen Swartz  www.yourinsurancechicknow.com

Jen Swartz has been a New England REIA member for over a year and has helped many of our members get set up with the right insurance plan for their business, lifestyle, and pocket!
  • Residential & Commercial multi family investor 1995-2010
  • Realtor 2006-present
  • National REO Brokers Conference Featured Speaker 2009
  • National REO Brokers Boot Camp Speaker 2009, 2010
  • Owner Diamond Services 2006-present
  • Independent Insurance Chick 2007-present
  • Co-founder of AAwesomeKids.org 2010

 

 

Check our website for the updated speaker schedule. www.newenglandreia.com


The Best Western Hotel
187 Chelsmford St.
Cheslmford, MA 01824
When: 1st Wednesday of Each Month
Admission Fees

Guests: $20.00 at the Door


Ask about getting YOUR membership today!

www.newenglandreia.com
item.how_to_find_us: Walk into the front of the building, and straight ahead you will see our Welcome table.
